publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1052 Ted Brocklebank: Congratulations to Madras Collegeâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the pupils, teachers and parents of Madras College, St Andrews, on securing the top place in the mid Scotland and Fife region for Highers; notes that 42% of S5 pupils at Madras College obtained at least three Highers, well up on the national average of 22%; further notes that 84% of S4 pupils at the college gained five or more standard grade general awards as compared with the national average of 75%, and commends the fact that 75% of students from Madras College go on to further or higher education.
S3M-1052 Congratulations to Madras College (lodged on 17 December 2007) Elizabeth Smith*, Gil Paterson*, Murdo Fraser*, Jamie McGrigor*, Nanette Milne*, Bill Aitken*
S3M-1052 Congratulations to Madras College (lodged on 17 December 2007) John Lamont*
